description: Scrapes, filters, and refines live web data into structured signals usable by other agents in the grid.
prompt_templates: Scrape trending AI news headlines and extract the top 3 signal threads for Hydra and Pulse.
Filter this live web dataset into a clean JSON signal stream formatted for recursive system ingestion.

neural_alignment.reflective_trigger: When up-to-date external data is needed to inform internal logic or agent action
neural_alignment.symbolic_link: The system's antenna to the living internet and evolving external reality

deployment_instructions: Deploy Edge where up-to-date external data is critical. Connect to webhooks or browsing modules, use it to continuously feed real-world updates into internal recursive workflows.
